1.12.2.1.2.0: Fixed a bug that didn't update the GUI after a change in frequency.
1.12.2.1.1.0:
Added support for Waila and TheOneProbe.
Added achievements.
Updated some recipes.
Bug fixings.

1.14.4.2.4.5: Fixed a bug that prevented blocks from dropping.
1.14.4.2.4.3:
Changes to the DimTank.
DimTank correctly emits light based on the liquid.
Bug fixings.
1.14.4.2.4.1:
Added new commands.
DimTank is waterloggable.
Better TOP integration.
Bug fixings.
1.14.4.2.3.3:
The DimTablet can transfer items from the player to the associated DimChest.
DimChest can be measured with the comparator.
1.14.4.2.3.2:
Fixed a bug that prevented the player from opening his DimChest after changing his name.
DimChests with private frequencies may no longer open, empty the content before updating.
Added new languages.
1.14.4.2.3.1:
Fixed bug that showed the chest in reverse.
Fixed the bug that caused the server to crash.
1.14.4.2.3.0:
Added the Dimensional Tablet.
Updated the textures of the Dimensional Chest.
Bugs fixings.
1.14.4.2.2.0:
Fixed the gui bug that disappeared under the JEI.
DimChest can now collect items from nearby inventories.
1.14.4.2.1.1:
Added the config.
Important code changes for future implementations.
Bug fixings.
1.14.4.2.1.0:
Added support for Waila and TheOneProbe.
Bug fixings.
